title: Prawns with a fresh tomato sauce, spaghetti and a langoustine shell foam
description: Seafood foam makes an elegant addition to a classic pasta and tomato sauce recipe. If you don’t have a pasta machine use shop bought spaghetti instead.
ingredients: 1 large handful fresh basil leaves, roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
8 prawns, head and tails removed, shells and meat reserved
4 cooked langoustines, tail meat removed and shells reserved
